column3: If there's a future bug that would otherwise cause this to fail because the tasks never successfully finish, this would now hang forever rather than failing, no? Maybe give it an absurd timeout, or verify that the numTasksInQueue are decreasing?\n
Hah!  See #6146 for my fix, which should be more robust to the "what if a task never successfully finishes" case, is less straightforward, but I think is a better test.\n
